p: In addition, the prediction using off-diagonal data to predict the HFRS occurrence proportions among the different land-use types in the on-diagonal area ( Table 3) showed an improved effect: r = 0.94 (P < 0.01, n = 10) and R 2 = 0.88. In contrast, the prediction of HFRS occurrence proportions among the different land-use types in the off-diagonal area ( Table 4) performed less well: r = 0.76 (P < 0.05, n = 10) and R 2 = 0.58, and should therefore be regarded as having only slight credibility. Such cross-validation proved the reliability of the formula ( 2) again.
